heading: Nainital
overview: Nainital is a Himalayan resort town in the Kumaon region of India’s Uttarakhand state, at an elevation of roughly 2,000m. Formerly a British hill station, it’s set around Nainital Lake, a popular boating site with Naina Devi Hindu Temple on its north shore. A cable car runs to Snow View observation point (at 2,270m), with vistas over the town and mountains including Nanda Devi, Uttarakhand’s highest

itinerary.day1Overview: Start your journey to Nainital in the morning. Enjoy a picturesque drive through scenic landscapes. On arrival in Nainital, check-in at the hotel and unwind. Explore the local markets and embrace the tranquility of the hills. Dinner & overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day2Overview: After breakfast, embark on a day of exploration in Nainital. Take a boat ride on the enchanting Naini Lake, visit the Naina Devi Temple, and explore the Mall Road. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Himalayas. Return to the hotel for dinner & overnight stay.

itinerary.day3Overview: After a leisurely breakfast, check-out from the hotel and start your journey back to Delhi. Reflect on the memorable moments spent in the serene beauty of Nainital.

inclusions: Box lunch water, banana apple and chocolate
Enterance fees (Cable, Car and Moon Valley)
